page.title: 20Recreation centre..
page.content: The centre was officially opened on the{26th April 1980}by the {Burgermeister Lufen.}There are{13} different activities to choose from. There is a{mother and toddler}group for babies{0-2 years.}There are groups from{3-50+.}The most popular activity is{Gymnastics}which is for boys and girls. The{multigym}is designed to hold from 1-6 people at a time. The most popular time of the week is {Monday to Friday, 7.30pm to 9.30pm.} People travel from{Partington}and {Warrington}as well as{locally.}At least one member of staff has to be able to do First Aid. Coaches come from Brookhouse Recreation Centre if there centre is not booked up.
